mentionedBy.name: GoDaddy
mentionedBy.notes: Web hosting provider competing in shared hosting market. Offered domain registration bundled with hosting plans. Known for WordPress-optimized hosting.

mentionedBy.name: GoDaddy
mentionedBy.notes: Top GoDaddy alternative for web hosting, offering superior features, value for money, and security. WordPress-recommended host with integrated website builder. All-in-one provider for hosting, domains, and site building.

mentionedBy.name: GoDaddy
mentionedBy.notes: Number one GoDaddy alternative for web hosting. Superior features, value for money, and security. WordPress-recommended host with integrated website builder. Included more essentials in entry-level plans than GoDaddy.

mentionedBy.name: GoDaddy
mentionedBy.notes: Number one alternative for WordPress users. WordPress.org-recommended host. Plans start at $2.99/month with free domain, SSL, and custom WordPress setup. Superior features, value, and security. Outperforms GoDaddy on uptime, speed, and security.

mentionedBy.name: GoDaddy
mentionedBy.notes: Top overall competitor providing best value among alternatives. WordPress.org-recommended host. Plans start at $2.99/month with free domain, SSL, and WordPress tools. Outperforms GoDaddy on uptime, site speed, and security. Scalable hosting plans including cloud and VPS hosting.
